meanings.sent1: The debased coin was scratched and tarnished.
meanings.sent2: The debased jewelry was made of cheap materials.
meanings.sent3: The debased toy car fell apart after one use.
meanings.sent4: Her debased painting was a mere imitation of the original masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The debased fabric felt rough and worn out.

meanings.definition: Lowered in moral character or integrity
meanings.sent1: He felt debased after lying to his friend.
meanings.sent2: The debased politician was caught in a corruption scandal.
meanings.sent3: The debased cookie jar mysteriously emptied itself overnight.
meanings.sent4: The debased company's unethical practices were exposed by the media.
meanings.sent5: The debased behavior of the bully shocked the entire school.
